input_select.hint: Select the desired inputs on which your solution should be based. By default, all inputs are selected
input_select.help_message: Please select a databag first to specify further training

solution-detail-pipeline-status.title: Pipeline status
solution-detail-pipeline-status.description: The pipeline status indicates the progress of your solution's processing. Once the pipeline is done, you can download your ML model, make predictions, and create transfer learning models based on this solution.

solution-detail-input.title: Initial input settings
solution-detail-input.description: The input settings were defined when the solution was created and cannot be changed afterwards. However, you can always create a new solution with different input settings.

solution-detail-output.title: Results based on the defined outputs
solution-detail-output.description: Accumulated rating provide an overall view, while individual ratings represent the quality of each individual selected output. The rating reflects the precision of forecasts and illustrates how close our predictions are to actual to the actual results.

solution-detail-download-model.title: Download ML-Model
solution-detail-download-model.description: Based on the provided solution, a ML model has been developed and fine-tuned to cater to the specific requirements. This model is now available for download, enabling users to directly implement and benefit from the insights and capabilities it offers.

solution-detail-dependencies.title: Solution dependencies
solution-detail-dependencies.description: Based on this solution, the following predictions and transfer learning models were developed.

predictions.title: Predictions
predictions.placeholder: No prediction is based on this solution.

transfer_learning_modelle.title: Transfer learning modelle
transfer_learning_modelle.placeholder: A reference to the transfer learning models will be provided later. This is a preliminary version and may be subject to changes.

solution-detail-delete-solution.title: Delete solution
solution-detail-delete-solution.description: If you delete the current solution, all associated predictions and transferlearning models will be emoved. This step is irrevocable.
